name: The Blackwood Brothers Quartet
description: '''The Blackwood Brothers''' are an American [[southern gospel]] [[quartet]]. Pioneers of the [[Christian music industry]], they are 8-time [[Grammy Award]] winners in addition to winning 7 [[Gospel Music Association]] [[GMA Dove Award|Dove Awards]]. They are also members of the Memphis Music Hall of Fame, [[Gospel Music Hall of Fame]], the [[Southern Gospel Museum and Hall of Fame]].
